EmailTemplate.name: Global English - One Time Oval Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Approved â€“ DuPont Oval Logo Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} :
Your request for a DuPont logo has been approved. Please be aware that this approval is limited only to the use of the DuPont logo specifically described in your request.
Attached to this note is a red Oval in various formats.
Please include the following footnote on your communication/materials:
"The DuPont Oval Logo is a trademark of DuPont or its affiliates."
If you need anything further, please let me know.
Amy J. Hurff DuPont Corporate Communications Brand Specialist 302-996-8361 amy.j.hurff@dupont.com
